resources.string: Failed to start the floating window
Click on the notification to enter the floating window permission settings
Site information has been copied to the clipboard

Hello, this software is only adapted for Android native standard API. 
If you are using a deeply customized Android system such as ColorOS, MIUI, FuntouchOS, OneUI, OriginOS, JoyUI, FlymeOS, SmartisanOS,
 or a self-developed system such as HarmonyOS, BlackBerryOS, AliOS that is compatible with Android. 
Then please manually check whether the notification permission and floating window permission of the application etc. are open. 
If the notification permission is turned off, then you may not see some necessary prompt information (this software promises not to contain any form of advertisement). 
If you turn off the floating window permission, you will not be able to use the floating window time display function of this software, which may cause trouble to your use.
(from Google Translate)
You did not open the notification, you may have missed the error message
